udasana 5ta aananda mawathe sita kiripindu sambuddha pujawa ragath perahara 6.00 ta wiharasthanayata langawimata niyamithaya.6.00 - 6.30 pehewas samadanwima ha keti anushasanawa jayashekhararamadhikari shasthrapathi rajawaththe wappa himi, 7 - 7.30 sambuddha pujawa ha theruwan wandanawa meheyawima thalalle siri mahinda nahimi, 8 - 9 shasthrapathi rajawaththe wappa himi meheyawana bhawana wadasatahana, 9.15 - 10.15 dharma deshanawa rajawaththe wappa himi, 10.15 - 11 sambuddha pujawa meheyawima thalalle mahinda nahimi, 12.30 - 12.45 seth pirith sajjhayanawa wimaladasa upasika mahathage pradhanathwayen 1.00 - 2.00 wiharastha upasaka upasika samithiye masika raswima thalalle mahinda nahimiyange pradhana anushasakathwayen 2.15 - 3.00 bhawanawa meheyawima thalalle mahinda nahimi 3.15 - 4.15 dharma deshanawa kalani wishwawidyalaye kathikacharya rajakiya panditha athkandure sumanasara himi , 4.30 - 5.30 dharma deshanawa bogahawawa rathana himi, 5.30 - 6.30 dharma deshanawa aariya dewa himi, 6.30 sil pawaranaya thalalle mahinda himi, 7.00 - 7.30 sambuddha gilanpasa mal sambuddha pujawa meheyawima thalalle dhammadewa himi, rathri dharma deshanawa kalani wishwawidyalaye kathikacharya alubomulle dhammalankara himi meheyawayi.piliyandala, makandana, walithotuwa waththa ‘sankalpagama’ sankalpa wiharayedi pinkam malawak pawathwimata sankalpa wiharadhipathi ha kasbawa shasanarakshaka mandalaye niyojya lekhakadhikari uggoda dhamminda himiyange anushasana paridi katayuthu sanwidhanaya kara atha.
